text: James Wesley Pruden Jr., known as Wesley Pruden (December 18, 1935 â€“ July 17, 2019) was an American journalist and author. He was the editor-in-chief of The Washington Times from 1992 until his retirement in 2008. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Journalists from Arkansas Category:Journalists from Washington, D.C.
